name: ROKAnol NL5 (C9-11 Pareth-5)
description: ROKAnol NL5 is a non-ionic surfactant from the group of ethoxylated alcohols (INCI name: C9-11 Pareth-5). The product belongs to the ROKAnol NL series based on C9-C11 synthetic alcohol. The high surface activity of these compounds is used in detergents and cleaning agents. The commercial product contains about 100% of the active substance and takes the form of a clear or turbid liquid, solidifying at a temperature below 0Â°C.
